meanings.definition: Cytotechnologists: professionals who specialize in the microscopic examination of cells for signs of disease.
meanings.sent1: The cytotechnologists carefully analyzed the cell samples under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: Hospitals rely on cytotechnologists to detect early signs of diseases in cell samples.
meanings.sent3: The cytotechnologists joked that they had a 'microscopic vision' superpower.
meanings.sent4: She had the precision of a cytotechnologist when it came to spotting irregularities.
meanings.sent5: The importance of cytotechnologists in diagnosing diseases cannot be overstated.

meanings.definition: Cytotechnologists: individuals trained to identify abnormalities in cell samples.
meanings.sent1: The cytotechnologists reported the presence of abnormal cells in the sample.
meanings.sent2: In the lab, cytotechnologists work diligently to spot any irregularities in cell slides.
meanings.sent3: The cytotechnologists play a crucial role in the 'cell detective' team.
meanings.sent4: Her attention to detail was like that of a cytotechnologist spotting anomalies.
meanings.sent5: The precision of cytotechnologists ensures accurate diagnosis of cell abnormalities.
